reviews.headline: I love it but it's sticky
reviews.comments: I absolutely love the consistency of this product. It's like rubbing pure silk on my face. It leaves a glowing finish. I was more than anything it was so sticky. It doesn't dry down so when I go to sleep, my face literally sticks to my pillowcase. But I really do love this product regardless.

reviews.headline: Not sure if I will purchase this.
reviews.comments:
As much as, I want to write all the ingredients that are NOT helping me achieve a much more natural product. It is better for everyone to just search them all by themselves. Because they're really long. üòÖ
This is a bit more of Silicone ingredients, some synthetic polymer (as a stabilizer, texture enhancer etc).  There's Vitamin B5 (panthenol). 
I did use this together with Intensive Moisturizing Milk Lotion and for more hydration. 
There's some good natural ingredients as well that helps my skin but I can't say this is going to be my favourite.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I think Anna might be one of my new favorite brands. The Anna 3 Ceraimide Panthenol Moisture Barrier Cream is a great product. This product is lightweight and melts into your skin while deeply hydrating and restoring your skin barrier. This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer
reviews.comments: This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review. This Anua 3 Ceramide Panthenol Moisture Barrier Cream is amazing! Super hydrating and moisturizing. As a dry skin girl I really enjoy this barrier cream and so does my skin.

reviews.headline: Not what I expected ‚Äî caused breakouts
reviews.comments:
I have dry and somewhat sensitive skin, and I bought this product hoping for hydration without clogging my pores. From the first application, I noticed the texture was very heavy and greasy, and it didn't absorb well.

After a few days of use, I started getting breakouts in areas where I don't usually have acne, especially on my forehead and cheeks. My skin also felt congested and looked overly shiny, even when using a small amount.

It might work better for extremely dry skin types, but unfortunately, it didn't work for me. I stopped using it and my skin started to improve.

I wouldn't repurchase or recommend it for sensitive or breakout-prone skin.

reviews.headline: they tried aka anua but a no for them
reviews.comments: I honestly do not like this product at all. Im trying to repair my barrier, i saw this product advertised over tiktok so I got it for my dry acne prone sensitive skin. Big mistake, made my skin so red ALL DAY. It didnt relax like at all. My skin likes barrier repair ingredients and centella, I dont know why it irritated my skin. I like the concept of this product, only positive thing i can say.  The product went into the trash

reviews.headline: Perfect for dry, acne-prone, reactive skin!
reviews.comments:
This past winter, my skin decided it wanted to freak out. My acne hasnt been this terrible since my teens - deep, painful hormonal breakouts on my cheeks and chin. I developed psoriasis along my hairline and ears that was painful to the touch. I tried a lot of products over the past 7 months and while my skin isn't perfect again, I finally have a regimen down that has seems to keep my skin calm and happy. My main concern was delivering moisture to my skin to keep the psoriasis at bay, without causing more breakouts in the process, and without being too heavy for the humid Chicago summers. 

This moisturizer is incredible! It's very rich, but not too heavy for daytime wear. It does take a while to fully dry down, but it doesnt pill with other products and makeup looks dewy and smooth over top. It doesn't feel like it's suffocating my skin. I am a very sweaty person and I never feel like I have the dreaded sweat mustache that a heavy moisturizer will usually give me. 

For nighttime, it's a dream. I usually slather on a thick layer to seal in the rest of my skincare, and again my skin feels soothed and not smothered. I wake up with glowy and bouncy skin and any redness I had before bed is significantly calmed down. 

I love it and I will repurchase again and again! A little goes a long way. I've had my first tube for over a month and I'm barely half way through.

reviews.headline: My dry skin loves this
reviews.comments:
I really struggle with dry skin because moist moisturizing lotions aren't strong enough and creams are too thick but THIS is perfect for me. Super lightweight, glowy results, and left my skin feeling hydrated. 
 It keeps my skin hydrated all day. I received this product for promotional purpose in exchange for my review.

reviews.headline: A must have for me
reviews.comments: I really struggle with dry skin because moist moisturizing lotions aren't strong enough and creams are too thick but THIS is perfect for me. Super lightweight, glowy results, and left my skin feeling hydrated.

reviews.headline: Love for combination skin
reviews.comments: Before using this product, I was using the Glow recipe plump plump cream, and I thought it was great but kinda expensive for the amount of product you get, so I tried Korean skincare a.k.a this product because I heard that u can get better for cheaper. I have been using this product for three days now (morning and night), and it's definitely my new holy grail! I personally have combination skin that gets oily when I use thick moisturizers and dry when I use thin moisturizers. This product is the best of both worlds, in the sense that it moisturizes my skin without making it oily, while simultaneously calming my skin which is important if u use adaplene gel. Overall I love this product! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Excellent Barrier Repair Cream
reviews.comments:
I am really impressed with this product,it revived my dehydrated and irritated combination acne prone skin in less than a week!my skin barrier is happy and stronger .no greasy feeling it's really soothing on the skin
This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review

reviews.headline: Regular degular
reviews.comments: Honestly I don't feel anything spectacular about this product. It's not special and hasn't really done much for me. It's in between thin and thick consistency, takes a bit to rub in, and doesn't have a smell. It leaves a film on the skin that does eventually soak in but I don't enjoy having to wait to lay down. In my opinion you're better off using Cerave because my other moisturizers do a much better job.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: The Anua 3 Ceramide Panthenol Moisture Barrier Cream is a lifesaver for my skin barrier. It has a rich, creamy texture that feels instantly comforting but doesn't clog pores or feel too heavy. I use it at night and wake up with calm, deeply hydrated skin that feels stronger and less irritated. The blend of ceramides and panthenol works so well to soothe redness and dryness‚Äîespecially when my skin is stressed or over-exfoliated. It creates a soft, breathable seal that locks in moisture without being greasy. It's fragrance-free, gentle, and perfect for sensitive or damaged skin. This is one of those barrier creams I'll keep reaching for all year round.

reviews.headline: Anua moisturizer
reviews.comments: Really amazing moisturizer to add along with the other Anua skincare products seen such an amazing smoothness on my skin!! I use this after the Anua toner and glow pads to see ultimate results skins so moisturized and healthy and glowing!! I will keep using these as my skin keeps looking better and better with each use!!

reviews.headline: WONDERFUL PRODUCT
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is so soothing, and lightweight. I'm 53, with very dry skin, and this has made a world of difference. I used to dread doing my skincare routine because it didn't seem like anything was helping, but everything I've used from this company has been a real winner!!!! I highly suggest you try it!!!!!!!!

reviews.headline: The only moisturizer you'll ever need
reviews.comments: The Anua  Ceramide Panthenol Moisture Barrier Cream is a game changer for dry and sensitive skin. It has a rich ,non-greasy texture that seriously hydrates and strengthens my skin barrier. I like how it soothes any irritation I have and leaves my skin feeling protected and nourished. After using it consistently, my skin feels more resilient and less reactive. It works great under makeup and doesn't feel heavy at all. The combination of ceramides and panthenol really locks in moisture all day long. This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review..

reviews.headline: Nice!
reviews.comments: I recently tried the Review 3 Ceramide Panthenol Moisture Barrier Cream. It has this nice, smooth texture that spreads easily on my skin without feeling greasy. A little goes a long way! The cream sinks in quickly, leaving my face feeling soft and hydrated right away. No sticky residue! Plus, it contains ceramides, which help strengthen the skin barrier, and I love knowing I'm doing something good for my skin. I also appreciate the way this cream feels under makeup. It provides a nice base, allowing foundation to glide on smoothly without clumping. My makeup looks fresher throughout the day, and I don't notice any dry spots peeking through, which is a bonus!Overall, I think this moisturizer is a fantastic option for anyone looking to boost their skincare routine without breaking the bank! I received the product for my honest review.

reviews.headline: I love it!
reviews.comments: Product was received as part of an educational promotion. I absolutely love this product and its price point, because you get so much bang for your buck. It'll leave your skin feeling hydrated and looking glowy throughout the entire day and night. I have dry and acne prone skin, and this product was perfect for that. I didn't have any flare ups and it kept my skin nice and hydrated. I paired it with the Rice 70 Intensive Moisturizing Milk, which I also highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Worth it
reviews.comments: I have tried many barrier creams since starting Tret and this one works just as well if not better at a way better price point! My skin feels lovely after applying this and it absorbs quickly so when using it at night it doesn't transfer onto my pillow while I'm sleeping. I also appreciate that it's non comedogenic so it doesn't cause my skin to have further issues.  I received this product in  exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: My New Go-To
reviews.comments: This moisturizer has become my daily driver. My super ultra dry, sensitive itchy skin LOVES this formula. The moisture lasts for days and my skin looks more plump and less stressed out. The formula is about the texture of a cream and it sinks into my skin without leaving it looking or feeling greasy or sticky. My skin looks moisturized and slightly radiant after I use it. There's no fragrance as far as I can tell which I appreciate. The packaging is clinical and scientific looking, very easy to use and keep your hands clean as well. I think this moisturizer is fantastic for people with dry skin and mild wrinkling like me. This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review

media.headline: A solid barrier care simple cream.

faceoff_positive.comments:
As someone who originally didn't have strong postive impressions of Anua, their moisturizers are seriously impressing me and shifting my views. After using this and another cream from Anua, I noticed that Anua kills it with the moisturizer game. 

‚≠êÔ∏è This ceramide based cream is rich and thick enough without being comedogenic, and provides such relieving care to the face. I noticed that it calms down puffy red face in the morning and makes my skin look even and glowy. It absorbs very easily too!

‚≠êÔ∏è The cream has these little beads that dissolve while applying it. These encapsulated beads are filled with ceramides, which means you're getting a fresh doese of active ingredients everytime you apply this. These small details make such a difference.

‚≠êÔ∏è This is alcohol-free and fragrance-free formulation that is suitable for all skin types. For context, I have combination/oily skin, and this helps my skin stay under control. I don't get a greasy look from using this either.

‚≠êÔ∏è Some noticeable beneficial ingredients in this include:
- centella asiatica extract (antioxidant, soothing)
- ectoin (antioxidant, soothing)
- ceramides NP (skin-renewing)
- glycine, serine, alanine, arginine, proline, threonine (amino acids that contribute to skin-renewing on a DNA level)
- panthenol (soothing)

‚≠êÔ∏è Packaging-wise, I like the simple and minimalistic look and feel. It has a subtle apothecary-style vibe, which I'm a fan of. Compared to some of the brand's other products, it doesn't look cheap or tacky. 

*I received this complimentary in exchange for an honest review. All thoughts are my own.
faceoff_positive.headline: An Amazing Cream that Made Me a Fan

faceoff_negative.comments:
I have dry and somewhat sensitive skin, and I bought this product hoping for hydration without clogging my pores. From the first application, I noticed the texture was very heavy and greasy, and it didn't absorb well.

After a few days of use, I started getting breakouts in areas where I don't usually have acne, especially on my forehead and cheeks. My skin also felt congested and looked overly shiny, even when using a small amount.

It might work better for extremely dry skin types, but unfortunately, it didn't work for me. I stopped using it and my skin started to improve.

I wouldn't repurchase or recommend it for sensitive or breakout-prone skin.
